description: This file implements a set of APIs for interacting with an OVSDB database, including operations like select, insert, delete, update, upsert, and mutate. It handles JSON-based communication and provides utility functions for building query conditions and processing results. The file appears to be part of a larger system for managing OVSDB tables, with functions facilitating database synchronization and manipulation.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_where_simple(const char * column,const char * value)
methods.description: Creates a simple where condition JSON object comparing a column to a value.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_where_simple_typed(const char * column,const void * value,ovsdb_col_t col_type)
methods.description: Creates a typed simple where condition JSON object for a specific column and value.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_where_uuid(const char * column,const char * uuid)
methods.description: Creates a UUID-based where condition JSON object.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_where_multi(json_t * where,...)
methods.description: Combines multiple where conditions into a single JSON array.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_mutation(const char * column,json_t * mutation,json_t * value)
methods.description: Constructs a mutation JSON array for a column update.

methods.name: int ovsdb_get_update_result_count_off(json_t * result,const char * table,const char * oper,int offset)
methods.description: Parses the result of an update operation, returning the count of affected rows or -1 on error.

methods.name: int ovsdb_get_update_result_count(json_t * result,const char * table,const char * oper)
methods.description: Wrapper for counting update results, decreasing reference count of result JSON.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_get_insert_result_uuid(json_t * result,const char * table,const char * oper,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Parses insert operation result, retrieving UUID if successful.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_sync_select_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where)
methods.description: Performs a select query with a 'where' condition, returning matching rows.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_sync_select(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value)
methods.description: Performs a select query based on a column-value pair.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_get_uuid_and_count(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Retrieves the UUID and count of rows matching a condition.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_get_uuid_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Wrapper to get UUID when a single row matches a condition.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_get_uuid(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Wrapper to get UUID based on a column and value.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_insert(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Inserts a row into a table and retrieves its UUID.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_delete_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where)
methods.description: Deletes rows matching a condition, returning delete count.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_update_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row)
methods.description: Updates rows matching a condition.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_update(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value,json_t * row)
methods.description: Updates rows based on a column-value pair.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_update_one_get_uuid(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Retrieves UUID and updates a row if exactly one match is found.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_upsert_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Performs an upsert operation: update if exists, insert if not.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_upsert(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Wrapper for upsert based on a column-value condition.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_mutate_uuid_set(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,const char * column,ovsdb_tro_t op,const char * uuid)
methods.description: Performs a mutate operation setting UUID in a condition.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_insert_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Inserts a row with a parent table/row context.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_upsert_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Performs an upsert, including mutate parent if needed.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_delete_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Deletes rows with parent context.
